name: John Doe

aboutpara: Curious developer focused on clean code, usability, and performance. Enjoys building products end-to-end and learning new technologies.

recommendations.name: Alex Smith
citations: John consistently delivers high-quality work on time.
Strong communicator who collaborates effectively across teams.
Raised the bar on code quality, testing, and documentation.
